author: WolfwithSword
description: Plays a simulation of the hunger games, based on https://brantsteele.net/hungergames/reaping.php and a modified version of https://github.com/DiamondIceNS/Hungrybot
install_msg: Thank you for installing HungerGames Bot. Get started with `[p]load hungergames`, then `[p]help hg`
